columns.name: CHANGE_USER
columns.comment: The user entering or last updating the record

columns.name: SALES_OFFICE
columns.comment: Unique identifier of a sales office

columns.name: STATUS
columns.comment: 0=Incomplete, 1=Held, 2=Complete, 3=Cancelled, 4=Provisional (quotes with status 4 may not be converted into orders)

columns.name: TEXT_NUMBER
columns.comment: Unique identifier of a text storage record.

columns.name: PRIME_ADDRESS_LINE
columns.comment: Primary address line number for outputting onto reports

columns.name: SOURCE
columns.comment: 0=Manual;1=Enq to Ord;2= EDI;3=System gen.A class,4=C Class, 5=copy

columns.name: PROFORMA
columns.comment: Indicates whether a proforma invoice is required(0=NO,1=YES)

columns.name: JOB_TITLE
columns.comment: The job title assigned to an individual

columns.name: EXPIRY_DATE
columns.comment: Batches and Quotations are valid until the expiry date.

columns.name: SEND_REQUIRED
columns.comment: 1 = Send document, 0 = Do not send document

columns.name: COMPLETION_DATE
columns.comment: Date for marking a document as complete

columns.name: ACKNOWL_TEXT
columns.comment: Text storage number for acknowledgement text

columns.name: DESPATCH_TEXT
columns.comment: Text storage number for despatch not text

columns.name: INVOICE_TEXT
columns.comment: text storage number for invoice text

columns.name: PREP_SHEET_REQUIRED
columns.comment: 0=prep sheet not required, 1= prep sheet required

columns.name: PREP_SHEET_COUNT
columns.comment: number of times prep sheet has been printed

columns.name: SALES_DIVISION
columns.comment: A division used to group sales offices

columns.name: PROFORMA_COUNT
columns.comment: Number of times proforma invoice has been printed

columns.name: ISSUE_TYPE
columns.comment: Movement type used to issue the item of stock from stores.

columns.name: QUOTE_PROBABILITY
columns.comment: Percentage probablility that quote will be converted into an order

columns.name: ORDER_COST
columns.comment: Total cost of sales order (I.e. cost price not selling price)

columns.name: BONUS_REDEEMED
columns.comment: The number of bonus points redeemed against despatch charges.

columns.name: FIRST_ORDER
columns.comment: The first order indicator. This will only be set to 1 on the first order created for a customer or converted from a quotation.

columns.name: REFUND_COMMENT
columns.comment: Link to text storage for refund comments

columns.name: DELIVERY_NAME
columns.comment: Stores the recipient name for gift orders

columns.name: ORIG_DESPATCH_TYPE
columns.comment: The system calculated Despatch Type for the Sales Order (only when including a Service product)
